title: LF gold 2+ Support
body:
Hi we are a Team playing in A league currently and going to be playing in one in May, we are mainly looking for a support with a good mental and that want's to improve. Our team is pretty much all Diamond last season so we are mainly focus on finding someone with potential and a good mental who fit's well that we can help improve together.
If interested add me in game :Blush uwu
or on discord :Blush#9331
We play in the evenings during the week and any time on weekends
